item.description:
We did this combo-theme last Fall & folks want to do this again:

- The Moth: In the spirit of The Moth Radio Hour, Share YOUR Story behind the Story of what you attracted (& how) with ease, flow & joy.

- Group Wisdom: What is one burning question/desire you have?

With collective group wisdom, everybody leaves hopeful, inspired & supported to be able to attract more of what they desire. (This has happened over & over in past "group wisdom" events.)

Great way to SPRING into inspired actions!

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 

(1) Go here:  http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in 

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Moth, Group Wisdom & Law Of Attraction
